channel.title: Gustav Janssons Projects
channel.description: Here you can find various projects I’ve did either myself or with others.

item.title: Looking for love
item.description: In this experience you wait for a bus that never seems to come and can take out your phone and try to look for love.

item.title: Ride
item.description: A somewhat work in progress of my Rust IDE, currently written in C++.

item.title: Truck game
item.description: Pseudo-3D game with a top-down view where 2 cats drive water supply trucks through the desert. Each player must try to destroy the other truck with weaponry, or by gaining a considerable lead.

item.title: Office rituals
item.description:
Just another day at the office. Drink loads of coffee. Smoke cigarettes. Take credit for your co workers accomplishments. Go to pointless meetings and avoid getting fired.

Drink coffee and smoke so that you can work efficiently. Everyone is working on the same project, but you win if you did most of the work ! You can steal each other’s work by working at someone else’s desk.

Oh, also, don’t miss the meetings or your Boss will be angry!

item.title: Sloth Dictator
item.description:
The Sloth dictator and his sloth generals are overseeing the Slothlympics.

Compete in the role of one of four animals and mash that button to get first to the finish line, but be careful: the dictator wants you to go slowly, so if they see you going fast, you’ll be penalized!

Mash the button to go faster, and use the other two to change lanes. If you get behind another runner, you can push them to make them go fast, and be penalized!

item.title: The Forrest Of Unconditional Love
item.description: Experience the feeling of beeing a giant on a cabin in the woods looking at cute animals and enjoying life.

item.title: Roomy
item.description: Get ouside the room. The most obvious is to use the key, but will that get you out?

item.title: The Mondrian crash
item.description: Score points by building chains and destroying them with explosions.

item.title: The Furry Fours vs. Goatie the EVIL Goat
item.description:
Play as a the evil goat and kill innocent small rabbits and kill the heroes.

This ludum dare I spent most of the time on the transitions and never really had the time to make the gmaeplay interesting. It’s function but not much else. It’s unfortunate since I really like the graphics and transitions.

item.title: A scientific experiment
item.description: Play as a cat, a rat or a skunk , their children and their childrens children. Die, mate and evolve while killing squiggles.

item.title: Octohack
item.description: As one of 2 programmers in a team of four we made a turn based octopus game where you kill your enemies by fighting them and detaching limbs for more attackpower.
